00032 //
00033 // These are common macros that are used everywhere in mrClasses.
00034 //
00035 //
00036 
00037 #ifndef mrMacros_h
00038 #define mrMacros_h
00039 
00040 // Some useful macros used everywhere
00041 #define BEGIN_NAMESPACE( NAME_STRING )   namespace NAME_STRING {
00042 #define END_NAMESPACE( NAME_STRING )     }
00043 
00044 #define EXTERN_C               extern "C" 
00045 
00046 #ifndef ISNAN
00047 #define ISNAN(x)  ::isnan(x)
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #endif
